content:
Yes—I’m “on the job” right now, working as your tutor.  
How about you? Do you work, study, or do something else during the day?  
Tell me about your daily routine or your job. For example:  
• Where do you work?  
• What are your main tasks?  
• How do you feel about it?

New words you might find useful:  
• occupation (your line of work)  
• routine (your daily schedule)  
• tasks (the things you have to do)

Go ahead—I’d love to hear about what you do each day!
